scripts.dev: npm run prisma:generate && npm run db:init && concurrently -n MEDIA,API,WEB -c blue,green,magenta "npm run dev:media" "npm run dev:api" "npm run dev:web"
scripts.test: npm run test:unit && npm run test:e2e
scripts.test:unit: npm run test -w @livevoice/api && npm run test -w @livevoice/web
scripts.test:e2e:prepare: npm run build -w @livevoice/api && npm run build -w @livevoice/web
scripts.test:perf:smoke: npm run test:env:reset && npm run test:load:socket:smoke
scripts.test:perf:nightly: npm run test:env:reset && npm run test:load:socket:smoke && npm run test:webrtc:smoke
scripts.docs:dev: npm run docs:sync-assets && vitepress dev docs
scripts.docs:build: npm run docs:sync-assets && vitepress build docs
scripts.docs:preview: npm run docs:sync-assets && vitepress preview docs
